    • Jekyll Server Error

    Nov 8, 2015 22:32 â€¢ Zhen Zhao

    Try to restart Jekyll Server after get a conversion error Show the following error:

    Solution:

    1. sudo lsof -i :4000 check PID of server port
    2. kill -9 + PID
    3. start Jekyll Server
    ^
